archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Stakeholder analyses and scopes the SOGP Topic
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Information pack will be handed over to stakeholder who is then expected to go through the material and analyse the proposed area within the ISF SOGP. Stakeholder is expected to analyse our current status against the area topics and see whatever stakeholders view of the important topics are inline with the CISO definitions which were defined earlier in the process. Stakeholder is also expected to highligh the topics we are aiming to fullfill (+measure) and whatever some topic should be exluced.
The scoping work is realized to a excel sheet
